body.p: Week starting 2nd August 2004, we will be moving *all* of the packages currently in net-www to new homes in the Portage tree. net-www has outgrown its original purpose, and the new categories that we are adding will make it much easier for users to find the packages they want.
The full list of packages is available here

Portage will automatically upgrade any packages you have installed the next time you run emerge -u. However, you will manually need to fix any entries in /etc/portage/package.* to refer to the new categories.
